snippet.title: Heavy Cargo - The Truck Simulator | Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Heavy Cargo - The Truck Simulator | Release on October 9th

The time has come, on October 9th you can finally get behind the wheel of real heavy loads in Heavy Cargo. 🚛 Transport large loads in highly detailed and customisable trucks through a 175 km² open world, with dynamic weather and rhythm!

Heavy Cargo will be released for pc and console:
Steam: https://links.aerosoft.com/HeavyCargo
PS5: https://links.aerosoft.com/HeavyCargoPS5
